title: Remarks by President Biden Before Air Force One Departure | The White House
content: Joint Base AndrewsPrince George’s County, Maryland12:06 P.M. EDTQ    (Inaudible.)THE PRESIDENT:  I couldn’t hear you.Q    Will you send officials to Ukraine?  Will you send senior officials to Ukraine?THE PRESIDENT:  We’ll — we’re making that decision now.  Thank you.Q    Who would you send?THE PRESIDENT:  Are you ready to go?Q    Are you?THE PRESIDENT:  Yeah.12:06 P.M. EDT
